/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with buildings and trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars of various colors are scattered across the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the buildings, which adds a sense of grandeur to the cityscape.
